trust-ai.title: TrustAI Shield: AI Fraud & Deepfake Detection
trust-ai.subtitle: TrustAI Shield is your intelligent guardian against 21st-century cybercrime. In seconds, our AI analyzes any social profile, suspicious message, or multimedia content to detect scams, deepfakes, and fake profiles with 98% accuracy. In a world where online fraud causes $63 billion in losses annually and the fraud detection market is growing at 21.2% per year, we make protection accessible to everyone—free for individuals, with tailored solutions for businesses and institutions.

about.title: About the Project: The Problem, A Silent Epidemic
about.description: Every day, millions of people worldwide are targeted by increasingly sophisticated cybercriminals. With $63.9 billion in global fraud losses projected for 2025, 60% of cyberattacks beginning with phishing, and deepfakes enabling single attacks to steal as much as $24 million, the threat is escalating. Current detection technologies are often prohibitively expensive, reserved for large enterprises, and too slow to react effectively.

features.title: Key Features: 3 Complementary Modules
list: Profile Analysis: Complete analysis of social profiles (Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter), calculating a TrustScore based on over 15 behavioral indicators to detect bots, fake accounts, and compromised profiles.
Scam Detection: Real-time analysis of suspicious texts and URLs, identifying phishing, advance-fee fraud, and crypto scams using a fraud pattern database that is updated daily.
Deepfake Detection: Authenticity verification of photos and videos to detect AI-generated manipulations and protect against visual identity theft.

tech.title: Our Differentiator: Accessibility + Precision
tech.description: TrustAI Shield features an intuitive interface that requires no technical training, delivering results in under 10 seconds. Validated on over 10,000 real cases, it achieves 98% accuracy. The platform is built with Next.js, ShadCN UI, and Tailwind CSS, providing a modern and responsive user experience.

network-chatbot.title: AI-Powered Network Monitoring Chatbot
network-chatbot.subtitle: An innovative solution that revolutionizes network administration by integrating the Zabbix monitoring system with a conversational AI accessible via WhatsApp.

about.title: About the Project: Simplifying Network Operations
about.description: Traditional network monitoring can be cumbersome, requiring administrators to navigate complex dashboards to access critical information. This project streamlines the process by creating a chatbot that allows IT staff to query network status, receive performance analyses, and get instant alerts directly from their mobile devices.

features.title: Key Features
list: Real-Time Monitoring via Chat: Administrators can send simple commands via WhatsApp to check the status of 17 production servers and other network devices.
Automated Multi-Channel Alerting: The system automatically sends alerts for critical incidents via Email, Telegram, and WhatsApp, significantly reducing response times.
On-Demand Performance Analysis: Facilitates easy access to performance data and analyses generated by Zabbix without needing to log into the main system.
Preventive Incident Monitoring: Integrates machine learning algorithms to analyze trends and predict potential issues before they impact productivity.

tech.title: Technical Implementation
tech.description: The solution is built using Python for the backend logic, integrating with the Zabbix API to fetch monitoring data and the WhatsApp Business API for communication. It is designed for high availability and low latency, ensuring that administrators have reliable, real-time access to the state of their network infrastructure.

secure-access-control.title: Robust Network Access Control System
secure-access-control.subtitle: A comprehensive security solution designed to protect corporate networks by implementing granular access control based on user identity and roles.

about.title: About the Project: Fortifying the First Line of Defense
about.description: In any corporate environment, controlling who can access the network is the first and most critical line of defense. This project involved engineering a robust and scalable access control system from the ground up, moving beyond simple password protection to a sophisticated, identity-based security model.

features.title: Key Features
list: AAA Framework: Utilizes the full Authentication, Authorization, and Accounting (AAA) framework with Freeradius on a Linux server to manage network access.
802.1X Port-Based Authentication: Implements the IEEE 802.1X standard to ensure that only authenticated and authorized devices can connect to network ports (both wired and wireless).
Role-Based Access Control (RBAC): Assigns specific access rules and network segments (VLANs) to users based on their role within the organization, ensuring the principle of least privilege.
Comprehensive Access Logging: All access attempts—successful or failed—are logged, providing a clear and auditable trail for security analysis and compliance.

tech.title: Technical Implementation
tech.description: The system is centered around a Freeradius server running on a hardened Linux distribution. It integrates with existing network infrastructure, including Cisco switches and routers, to enforce access policies. The configuration allows for high scalability and can be adapted to support various authentication methods and directory services like LDAP or Active Directory.
